Class Particle

java.lang.Object
  trivia.Actor
      trivia.Bullet
          trivia.Particle

public class Particle
extends Bullet

Fundamentally the same as a Bullet, but doesn't collide with other actors due to class name.

Author:
Cody Swendrowski, Dan Miller
